actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Reserve Act to impose reserve requirements on money market mutual funds.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Reserve Act to require money market mutual funds to maintain reserves equivalent to those imposed on transaction accounts.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Reserve Act to impose reserve requirements on money market mutual funds.
